医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
工作压力与中年女性未来病假风险增加有关哥德堡大学的一项研究显示，经历工作相关压力的中年女性未来请病假的风险显着增加。工作中缺乏影响力和冲突是明显的压力因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Work-lated-stress-linked-to-increased-risk-of-future-sick-leave-in-middle-ged-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Work-lated-stress-linked-to-increased-risk-of-future-sick-leave-in-middle-ged-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f74e81a0-9293-40bf-a427-1dda32cd1e5b Thu, 15 Aug 2024 22:14:17 -0400 Work-related stress linked to increased risk of future sick leave in middle-aged women
突破性研究发现与正常压力脑积水相关的新遗传变异东芬兰大学及其合作伙伴的一项新研究发现了与正常压力脑积水 (NPH) 相关的新遗传变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Groundwriting-study-uncovers-new-genic-variants-linked-to-normal-Pressure-Hydrocephalus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Groundwriting-study-uncovers-new-genic-variants-linked-to-normal-Pressure-Hydrocephalus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe8e5708-b244-48ac-aa8c-51d2c6ceace8 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 22:11:02 -0400 Groundbreaking study uncovers new genetic variants linked to normal pressure hydrocephalus
疾病预防控制中心的研究显示，老年人莱姆病的发病率比之前报道的要高得多CDC 和爱荷华大学利用医疗保险数据进行了一项流行病学研究，结果显示，与公共卫生监测数据相比，65 岁以上美国成年人莱姆病诊断发生率高出七倍，尤其是在高发州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/CDC-study-reveals-significantly-higher-Lyme-disease-rates-among-older-adults-than-previously-reported.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/CDC-study-reveals-significantly-higher-Lyme-disease-rates-among-older-adults-than-previously-reported.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1588722c-cae6-48d7-92dd-af8833c8c6fa Thu, 15 Aug 2024 21:57:00 -0400 CDC study reveals significantly higher Lyme disease rates among older adults than previously reported
FDA 称其为“召回”，但目标医疗设备通常仍在使用中2016 年，医疗设备巨头雅培 (Abbott) 对其 MitraClip 心脏设备进行了召回——“一级召回，最严重的类型”，FDA 表示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/The-FDA-calls-them-e28098recallse28099-yet-the-targeted-medical-devices-often-remain-in-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/The-FDA-calls-them-e28098recallse28099-yet-the-targeted-medical-devices-often-remain-in-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=489fa26c-dbc1-4c3d-b153-ca77aa9dec72 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 21:16:02 -0400 The FDA calls them ‘recalls,’ yet the targeted medical devices often remain in use
由于麻疹在非洲迅速蔓延，世界卫生组织宣布国际卫生紧急状态世卫组织已宣布刚果民主共和国和其他非洲国家的麻疹疫情激增为国际关注的突发公共卫生事件，并指出其进一步传播的可能性以及迫切需要采取协调一致的全球行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/WHO-declares-international-health-emergency-as-mpox-spreads-rapidly-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/WHO-declares-international-health-emergency-as-mpox-spreads-rapidly-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb2d6d3d-ec89-4867-ad56-157db4abf6b2 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 19:19:00 -0400 WHO declares international health emergency as mpox spreads rapidly in Africa
伸展运动与冥想：新研究发现这两种练习都能减少肝硬化患者的夜间肌肉痉挛研究人员调查了伸展运动和冥想对肝硬化患者夜间肌肉痉挛的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Stretching-vs-meditation-New-study-finds-both-practices-reduce-nocturnal-muscle-cramps-in-cirrosis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Stretching-vs-meditation-New-study-finds-both-practices-reduce-nocturnal-muscle-cramps-in-cirrosis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9787d032-1767-459d-a204-a9a07b1fee3f Thu, 15 Aug 2024 10:42:00 -0400 Stretching vs. meditation: New study finds both practices reduce nocturnal muscle cramps in cirrhosis patients
人工智能预测舌头疾病的准确率高达 96%一种利用机器学习来预测舌头疾病的新颖系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Artificial-intelligence-predicts-tongue-disease-with-96-percent-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Artificial-intelligence-predicts-tongue-disease-with-96-percent-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a3a51a9-d401-4cd8-898d-527dbba01896 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 07:53:00 -0400 Artificial intelligence predicts tongue disease with 96 percent accuracy
研究人员揭示了为什么富含镁的饮食对您的健康如此重要研究人员检查了澳大利亚健康中年人群的镁缺乏是否与体内 DNA 损伤相关的同型半胱氨酸水平升高独立存在或同时存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Researchers-reveal-why-a-diet-rich-in-magnesium-is-so-important-for-your-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Researchers-reveal-why-a-diet-rich-in-magnesium-is-so-important-for-your-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9652ea06-68b2-48c4-a38c-b811c13b2216 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 07:39:00 -0400 Researchers reveal why a diet rich in magnesium is so important for your health
抗炎饮食可以降低患有心脏代谢疾病的老年人患痴呆症的风险研究人员调查了抗炎饮食是否支持心脏代谢疾病（CMD）患者的认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Anti-lingual-diets-could-lower-dementia-risk-among-older-individuals-with-cardiometabolic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Anti-lingual-diets-could-lower-dementia-risk-among-older-individuals-with-cardiometabolic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53635d7d-f186-43ea-81b7-8fc5794feb90 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 06:51:00 -0400 Anti-inflammatory diets could lower dementia risk among older individuals with cardiometabolic disorders
新研究给出了结直肠癌基因组成的前所未有的观点研究人员通过对 2,023 个样本进行全基因组测序，确定了新的驱动基因、分子亚群和潜在的临床意义，提供了结直肠癌（一种始于结肠或直肠的癌症）的全面基因组特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/New-research-gives-unprecedented-view-of-colorectal-cancer-genic-makeup.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/New-research-gives-unprecedented-view-of-colorectal-cancer-genic-makeup.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fef0b9c-7402-48d7-9d3d-5f36263e90d0 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 04:41:00 -0400 New research gives unprecedented view of colorectal cancer genetic makeup
